Package org.pepstock.charba.client.ml

Class BasePolynomialRegression<T extends NativeBasePolynomialRegression>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.ml.BaseRegression<T>
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.ml.BasePolynomialRegression<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsRegression
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PolynomialRegression, RobustPolynomialRegression
    abstract class BasePolynomialRegression<T extends NativeBasePolynomialRegression>
extends BaseRegression<T>
    Polynomial Regression is a regression algorithm that models the relationship between a dependent(y) and independent variable(x) as nth degree polynomial.
    The Polynomial Regression equation is given below:

    y = b0 + b1x1 + b2x12 + b2x13 +...... bnx1n
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
